1.21.21.0.1.1: Fix crash when pos is null

Fix flame particles not spawning while frozen. Add FBPSnowParticle water physics. Particle physics improvements. Fix shaders incompatibility. Code cleanup & improvements. Add FBPDripParticle. Add block placing animation. Fix incorrect lighting of FBPTerrainParticle

1.21.21.0.0.1-beta: Fix a crash when Breeze shoots projectile. Fix a crash on Freeze effect
